Verses: 1 aadhalaal, En Kumaarane, Nee Kiristhu Yesuvilulla Kirubaiyil Balappadu.
2 anega Saatchigalukku Munbaaga Nee Ennidaththil Kettavaigalai Matravargalukkup Bodhikkaththakka Unmaiyulla Manushargalidaththil Oppuvi.
3 neeyum Yesukiristhuvukku Nalla Porchsevaganaaith Theenganubavi.
4 thandil Sevagampannugira Evanum, Thannaich Sevagamezhudhikkondavanukku Etravanaayirukkumbadi, Pizhaippukkaduththa Aluvalgalil Sikkikkollamaattaan.
5 melum Oruvan Malyuththampanninaalum, Sattaththinpadi Pannaavittaal Mudisoottappadaan.
6 pirayaasappattup Payiridugiravan Balanil Mundhip Pangadaiyavendum.
7 naan Sollugiravaigalaich Sindhiththukkol; Karththar Ellaak Kaariyangalilum Unakkup Buththiyaith Thandharuluvaar.
8 thaaveedhin Sandhadhiyil Pirandha Yesukiristhu, En Suviseshaththinpadiye, Mariththorilirundhezhuppappattavarendru Ninaiththukkol.
9 indhach Suviseshaththinimiththam Naan Paadhaganpolak Kattappattu, Thunbaththai Anubavikkiren; Dhevavasanamo Kattappattirukkavillai.
10 aagaiyaal, Therindhukollappattavargal Kiristhu Yesuvinaal Undaana Ratchippai Niththiya Magimaiyode Petrukkollumpadi, Sagalaththaiyum Avargal Nimiththamaaga Sagikkiren.
11 indha Vaarththai Unmaiyulladhu; Ennavenil, Naam Avarodekooda Mariththomaanaal, Avarodekoodap Pizhaiththumiruppom;
12 avarodekoodap Paadugalai Sagiththomaanaal Avarodekooda Aalugaiyum Seyvom; Naam Avarai Marudhaliththaal, Avarum Nammai Marudhalippaar;
13 naam Unmaiyillaadhavargalaayirundhaalum, Avar Unmaiyullavaraayirukkiraar; Avar Thammaiththaam Marudhalikkamaattaar.

14 ivaigalai Avargalukku Ninaippootti, Ondrukkum Pirayojanamillaamal, Ketkiravargalaik Kavizhththuppodugiradharkedhuvaana Vaakkuvaadham Seyyaadhabadikku, Karththarukku Munbaaga Avargalukku Echchariththup Buththisollu.
15 nee Vetkappadaadha Oozhiyakkaaranaayum Saththiya Vasanaththai Nidhaanamaaip Paguththup Bodhikkiravanaayum Unnai Dhevanukku Munbaaga Uththamanaaga Niruththumbadi Jaakkiradhaiyaayiru.
16 seerkedaana Veenpechchugalukku Vilagiyiru; Avaigalaal (kallappodhagargalaana) Avargal Adhiga Avabakthiyullavargalaavaargal;
17 avargaludaiya Vaarththai Aripilavaiyaippolap Padarum; Imeneyum Pileththum Appadippattavargal;
18 avargal Saththiyaththai Vittu Vilagi, Uyirththezhudhal Nadandhaayitrendru Solli, Silarudaiya Visuvaasaththaik Kavizhththuppodugiraargal.

19 aagilum Dhevanudaiya Urudhiyaana Asthibaaram Nilaiththirukkiradhu; Karththar Thammudaiyavargalai Arivaarenbadhum, Kiristhuvin Naamaththaich Sollugira Evanum Aniyaayaththaivittu Vilagakkadavanenbadhum, Adharku Muththiraiyaayirukkiradhu.
20 oru Periya Veettile Ponnum Velliyumaana Paaththirangalumallaamal, Maramum Mannumaana Paaththirangalumundu; Avaigalil Sila Ganaththirkum Sila Ganaveenaththirkumaanavaigal.

21 aagaiyaal Oruvan Ivaigalaivittu, Thannaich Suththigariththukkondaal, Avan Parisuththamaakkappattadhum Ejamaanukku Ubayogamaanadhum, Endha Narkiriyaikkum Aayaththamaakkappattadhumaana Ganaththukkuriya Paaththiramaayiruppaan.

22 andriyum, Paaliyaththukkuriya Ichchaigalukku Nee Vilagiyodi, Suththa Irudhayaththode Karththaraith Thozhudhukollugiravargaludane, Needhiyaiyum Visuvaasaththaiyum Anbaiyum Samaadhaanaththaiyum Adaiyumpadi Naadu.
23 puththiyeenamum Ayukthamumaana Tharkkangal Sandaigalaip Pirappikkumendru Arindhu, Avaigalukku Vilagiyiru.
24 karththarudaiya Oozhiyakkaaran Sandaipannugiravanaayiraamal, Ellaaridaththilum Saandhamullavanum, Podhagasamarththanum, Theemaiyaich Sagikkiravanumaayirukkavendum.
25 edhirpesugiravargal Saththiyaththai Ariyumpadi Dhevan Avargalukku Mananthirumbudhalai Arulaththakkadhaagavum,
26 pisaasaanavanudaiya Ichchaiyinpadi Seyya Avanaal Pidipattirukkira Avargal Marubadiyum Mayakkanthelindhu Avan Kannikku Neengaththakkadhaagavum, Saandhamaai Avargalukku Ubadhesikkavendum.
